sentences.sContent: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray.
sentences.sContent_eng: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray.
sentences.sCn: 可以说，他是混战中的一个无懈可击的侏儒。

sentences.sContent: A beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of the circus performers who is also a dwarf, but his friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.
sentences.sContent_eng: A beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of the circus performers who is also a dwarf, but his friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.
sentences.sCn: 一位漂亮的吊杠艺术家同意与马戏团的领导也是一位侏儒演员结婚，但是他的朋友发现，她之所以想与之结婚的原因是为了他的财产。

sentences.sContent: The only other known example of such an oddly angled orbit was Pluto, until its demotion to dwarf planet status.
sentences.sContent_eng: The only other known example of such an oddly angled orbit was Pluto, until its demotion to dwarf planet status.
sentences.sCn: 唯一的另一个已知的以如此奇怪的角度运行的例子是冥王星，直到它降级为矮行星。

phrases.pCn: 红矮星（表面温度较低且亮度较弱的恒星）

trans.tranOther: a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
